Starters.name: Bellagio Bruschetta:
Starters.description: Grilled sourdough bread, vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, and a drizzle of balsamic reduction.

Starters.name: Grilled Halloumi with Pomegranate Glaze:
Starters.description: Seared halloumi cheese, mixed greens, pomegranate seeds, roasted pine nuts, and a honey-pomegranate glaze.

Starters.name: Octopus Carpaccio:
Starters.description: Thinly sliced octopus, lemon zest, capers, olive oil, sea salt, and microgreens.

Starters.name: Feta-Stuffed Peppers:
Starters.description: Roasted red bell peppers filled with herbed feta, garlic, black olives, and fresh oregano.

Main Courses.name: Seafood Risotto:
Main Courses.description: Arborio rice, mussels, clams, prawns, squid, garlic, saffron, and a rich tomato broth.

Main Courses.name: Lamb Moussaka:
Main Courses.description: Layered minced lamb, eggplant, zucchini, tomatoes, cinnamon-spiced béchamel, and a touch of grated pecorino cheese.

Main Courses.name: Mediterranean Sea Bass:
Main Courses.description: Grilled sea bass, lemon-caper butter sauce, sautéed spinach, cherry tomatoes, and a side of rosemary-infused potatoes.

Main Courses.name: Porcini Mushroom Tagliatelle:
Main Courses.description: Fresh tagliatelle pasta, wild porcini mushrooms, garlic, white wine, parsley, and Parmesan cheese.

Desserts.name: Limoncello Tiramisu:
Desserts.description: Layers of sponge cake soaked in Limoncello, mascarpone cream, lemon zest, and a dusting of cocoa powder.

Desserts.name: Panna Cotta with Berries:
Desserts.description: Vanilla panna cotta, fresh mixed berries, and a tangy berry coulis.

Desserts.name: Olive Oil Cake:
Desserts.description: Moist olive oil cake, orange zest, almonds, and a side of whipped cream.

Desserts.name: Affogato al Caffè:
Desserts.description: Vanilla gelato, shot of espresso, and a sprinkle of dark chocolate shavings.
